attributes.action: Recommend that Prime Minister Viktor Orban receive the 2016 Charlemagne Prize.
attributes.background: For outstanding loyalty to the indigenous peoples of Europe, please ask UK parliamentarians to recommend the Hungarian Prime Minister, Viktor Orban, to the Board of Directors of the Charlemagne Prize, in order that he receive this prestigious award in 2016.

rejection.details: Anyone can write to the Board of Directors of the Prize to make a nomination. This would be a decision for individual MPs to take, not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
